==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Hit and Run
|file_1 = Hilichurl Berserker Rapid Swing Charge
|desc_1 = Wildly swings its club around and charges straight towards the player. At the end of the charge, performs an extra powerful swing. The each of the charging swings and the final swing deals '''10% ATK''' and '''100% ATK''' respectively as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. This attack is only used when the Hilichurl Berserker's club is ignited.

|name_2 = Torch Strike

|caption_2 = Smack (Ignited)
|file_2_2 = Hilichurl Berserker Smack Extinguished
|caption_2_2 = Smack (Extinguished)

|name_3 = Reignition

|caption_3_2 = Reignite

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br />These hilichurls wield flaming clubs and charge with reckless abandon to chase intruding adventurers off. Most wildfires in the grasslands or forests are not actually caused by a [[Klee|certain special Knight]], but due to the actions of these hilichurls.|[[Archive]]}}
